      • getByWorkItemsAndFields

        public static java.util.List<THistoryTransactionBean> getByWorkItemsAndFields(int[] workItemIDs,
                                                              java.lang.Integer[] fieldIDs,
                                                              boolean includeField,
                                                              java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> personIDs,
                                                              java.util.Date fromDate,
                                                              java.util.Date toDate)
        Gets the history transactions for a number of workItems and fields for a specific user that has caused these changes.
        Parameters:
        workItemIDs - an array with issue oids
        fieldIDs - if not null or empty filter also by fieldID, otherwise neglect this parameter. See SystemFields for possible values
        includeField - relevant only if fieldID not null or empty:
        • true: include the fields
        • false: exclude the fields
        personIDs - if not null or empty filter also by personID
        fromDate - if specified consider history only after this date
        toDate - if specified consider history only before this date
        Returns:
        a list of history transactions defined as shown above

      • getByWorkItemsFieldNewValuesDates

        public static java.util.List<HistorySelectValues> getByWorkItemsFieldNewValuesDates(int[] workItemIDs,
                                                                    java.lang.Integer fieldID,
                                                                    java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> selectValues,
                                                                    java.util.Date dateFrom,
                                                                    java.util.Date dateTo)

        Gets the HistorySelectValues (that is the actual field changes) list for a given set of issues. Only the specified field with the given select values is considered. Only the given time interval is considered, if specified.

        The selectValues list depends on the field type: for example for statuses these are the object ids of the statuses to consider; for priorities these are the object ids for priorities to be considered.

        Parameters:
        workItemIDs - should not be null or zero length
        fieldID - should not be null. See SystemFields for possible values
        selectValues - if null do not filter
        dateFrom - if null do not filter
        dateTo - if null do not filter
        Returns:

      • getByWorkItemsLongTextField

        public static java.util.List<IntegerStringBean> getByWorkItemsLongTextField(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> workItemIDs,
                                                            java.lang.Integer fieldID)
        Gets an IntegerStringBean list where the integer is the object id of an issue and the string the new value of a long text field as specified by fieldID. Thus, all issues are returned that had a long text change within this field.
        Parameters:
        workItemIDs - if null get for all workItems
        fieldID - should not be null
        Returns:
